description: Your new go-to shirt for outdoor adventures, the Selun FL Sun Hoody is all about the essentials. Quick-drying stretch fabric comes together with offset seams and a relaxed fit for a shirt that delivers equal amounts of comfort and performance. Cover all your bases with UPF 50+ sun protection and a silver-free anti-odor treatment, as well as smart features like thumb loops and an integrated chin protector for extra defense against the sun and wind. Plus, keep your impact low thanks to bluesign® approved, solution dyed knit fabric made with recycled polyester. Be ready for anything with the Selun.
name: Mammut Selun FL Sun Hoody - Mens
